name: get_current_exchange_rate
description: Fetches the exchange rates between a base currency and one or more target currencies using the API Layer.

base_currency.description: The base currency code (e.g., 'USD' for US Dollar, 'EUR' for Euro).

target_currency.description: The target currency code or a list of target currency codes (e.g., 'EUR', 'GBP', or ['EUR', 'GBP', 'CAD']).
